column4: why doesn't GIMP have a simple tool to make a rectangle? (not a rectangle SELECT area, but just a damned rectangle) and if there's a way to make it have one, how do I do it?
you want an open rectangle frame ... select a rectangle, de-select a rectangle inside of it and fill
and dbugger; I've figured it out, just select a rectangular area, then go to selection editor, then go to "paint along the selection outline" and then do that xD
that's one way to do it
